about_the_game:
From roaring down the streets of Neon City's busiest highway to upgrading your Red Stallion in Harry's underground garage, the original soundtrack of Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive paints a dangerously upbeat world with 80s Retro Synthpop flowing through its veins.

Originally composed during the 48-hour Global Game Jam 2020 exclusively for Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive, the downloadable version of the soundtrack offers expanded and deeper tracks, re-produced for deeper engagement and easy listening.
detailed_description:
From roaring down the streets of Neon City's busiest highway to upgrading your Red Stallion in Harry's underground garage, the original soundtrack of Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive paints a dangerously upbeat world with 80s Retro Synthpop flowing through its veins.

Originally composed during the 48-hour Global Game Jam 2020 exclusively for Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive, the downloadable version of the soundtrack offers expanded and deeper tracks, re-produced for deeper engagement and easy listening.
name: Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 100 MB available space

short_description: Enter Neon City - a vibrant world painted by the dangerously upbeat 80s Synthpop that flows through its veins. This original soundtrack was created exclusively for Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive. Composed and produced by John Oestmann.
